text: 18.3: Mt 19.14 naŋga, Mk 10.15 naŋga, Lu 18.17ambami, Yi narɨŋ kandɨ ambin, narɨ mavɨ maŋgimɨruta ñɨŋisɨrambɨ kɨndu maña maŋgɨyɨmandɨraŋa, Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ maŋgɨyɨmandɨra.18.3 Matyundu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ kuyu kutaŋguta kumanzɨpi timu tɨŋgɨruramata ambavarami hañɨndu muhanda nɨ. Kuyu kanɨŋandɨhin 18.3yɨ kɨta uta 35yɨ kɨyɨ. Kru Jisas naŋga kɨndandu haŋɨnɨŋ muhɨmɨmuhɨm vana nurɨŋambi masamasa andɨmu vata ambavarami.
